grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 烈日【レツジツ】blazing sun, scorching sun, hot day
痛烈【ツウレツ】severe, bitter, scathing
kun reading compounds: 激しい【はげしい】violent, furious, tempestuous, extreme, intense, fierce, strong, fervent, vehement, incessant, relentless, precipitous, steep
激しい競争【はげしいきょうそう】intense competition, hot competition
